Test LGTM

Before Fix:

It took about 12 mins to connect ESXi host after MS was restarted.

2017-08-29 15:55:57,441 INFO  [o.a.c.s.l.CloudStackExtendedLifeCycle] (main:null) (logid:) Running system integrity checker org.apache.cloudstack.utils.identity.ManagementServerNode@56c9aa12
2017-08-29 15:55:57,441 INFO  [o.a.c.s.l.CloudStackExtendedLifeCycle] (main:null) (logid:) Configuring CloudStack Components
2017-08-29 16:08:30,772 DEBUG [c.c.a.m.AgentManagerImpl] (AgentTaskPool-1:ctx-e4b9546b) (logid:7831f281) Simulating start for resource 10.112.3.36 id 1
2017-08-29 16:08:30,772 DEBUG [c.c.a.m.AgentManagerImpl] (AgentTaskPool-1:ctx-e4b9546b) (logid:7831f281) Creating agent for host 1
2017-08-29 16:08:30,951 DEBUG [c.c.s.StatsCollector] (StatsCollector-4:ctx-200c10b0) (logid:88d478b5) HostOutOfBandManagementStatsCollector is running...


After Fix:

It took about 38 sec to connect ESXi host after MS was restarted.

2017-08-29 17:42:14,432 INFO  [o.a.c.s.l.CloudStackExtendedLifeCycle] (main:null) (logid:) Running system integrity checker org.apache.cloudstack.utils.identity.ManagementServerNode@4d1847de
2017-08-29 17:42:14,433 INFO  [o.a.c.s.l.CloudStackExtendedLifeCycle] (main:null) (logid:) Configuring CloudStack Components

2017-08-29 17:42:52,302 DEBUG [c.c.a.m.AgentManagerImpl] (AgentTaskPool-1:ctx-2410f7cb) (logid:b06510de) Creating agent for host 1
2017-08-29 17:42:53,748 DEBUG [c.c.s.StatsCollector] (StatsCollector-1:ctx-5c38226e) (logid:203d8311) HostStatsCollector is running...

Currently we will not change the check (It's also not checked in isolated network case). We will change it as soon as we add support for site-to-site VPN for Nuage where Nuage will be the source NAT provider.

executed updatePortForwrdingRule api

@jayapalu please avoid merging PRs and inform other people who may be still discussing the results and waiting for feedback, assessing them.

Also check before merging PRs that they have (1) appropriate JIRA ids in them, (2) the commits are squashed, ask the authors to do so or use github UI for squash/merging them, this PR was merged that created three commits and will make it challenging during release notes updationg: https://github.com/apache/cloudstack-docs-rn/tree/master/utils
@wido I've tried 4 times now, the trillian environment fails to come up due to systemvms fail to come up. Do you think there are changes that might affect systemvm agents/patching? /cc @borisstoyanov
FYI, we haven't seen this in other master PRs, so could be related to these changes...

LGTM for Testing.
Initial block the URL in MS from which you want to download the volume.
Set the global parameter "validate.url.existence" to true.
Try to upload volume it fails.
Set the validate.url.existence parameter in Global Settings to false and restart the management server.
Now the volumes gets successfully uploaded.
@NuxRo do you happen to have plans to upload an ISO for macchinina at http://dl.openvm.eu/ ? I've been struggling to find an iso available on the internet for these tests...

Well, I wouldn't even know where to begin. All I'm doing is use buildroot to generate a working layout and stick syslinux on it.
Why would you want an ISO? Maybe there's a way around it etc.

@NuxRo We've implemented a checksum validation for templates and ISOs, that checksum is done after downloading. We already have tests for templates now we're thinking to create tests for ISOs as well. Machinina is small and that makes our tests run fast, thats it :)
@blueorangutan package
@DagSonsteboSB a Jenkins job has been kicked to build packages. I'll keep you posted as I make progress.
Packaging result: ✔centos6 ✔centos7 ✔debian. JID-1047
What is expected of this ISO exactly? Does it need to boot, execute anything etc?
alright, we need to run another round of testing and some new changes /cc @nvazquez
